catalog_script_client.name: Format a catalog phone varaible

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_49a751391b9ccd10c024a601604bcbc0
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Classic Car Parts">d8f45c611bdc8d10c024a601604bcba4</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:a4f494a11bdc8d10c024a601604bcbf8</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Format a catalog phone varaible</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}
	g_form.hideErrorBox('u_phone_number');
	var number = newValue.replace('+', '%2B');
	$.get("/api/sn_hr_core/hr_rest_api/validatPhoneNumber?phoneNumber=" + number, function(answer) {
		if (answer) {
			var result = answer['result'];
			var val = JSON.parse(result);
			if (val.valid) {
				if (newValue != val.number)
					g_form.setValue('u_phone_number', val.number);
			} else
				g_form.showFieldMsg('u_phone_number', getMessage('Not a valid phone number'), 'error');			
		}
	});
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-12-08 23:04:06</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>49a751391b9ccd10c024a601604bcbc0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Format a catalog phone varaible</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value=" Classic Car Restoration" source="x_snc_classic_car">5662f55b1bf7f41049d9dbd8b04bcb6e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value=" Classic Car Restoration">5662f55b1bf7f41049d9dbd8b04bcb6e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_49a751391b9ccd10c024a601604bcbc0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-12-08 23:30:44</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
